description: Developed responsive and dynamic user interfaces using React.js, Angular, Vue.js, and modern UI frameworks like Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap 5.
Built cross-browser compatible pages with HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and TypeScript to deliver smooth user experiences.
Collaborated with designers and engineers to improve development workflows and resolve UI/performance issues efficiently.
Troubleshot and maintained web applications to ensure stability and uninterrupted functionality.
Developed backend services and APIs using Node.js, Express.js, Nest.js, Python, Django, .NET, and GraphQL.
Implemented RESTful APIs to support user interactions, authentication, and real-time features.
Built and maintained CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions, Azure DevOps, and Jenkins for automated testing and deployment.
Used Docker extensively for containerization, environment consistency, microservices development, and streamlined deployment workflows.
Implemented comprehensive unit and integration tests using Jest, Mocha, NUnit, PyTest, and other testing frameworks to ensure code reliability and maintainability.
Deployed applications to AWS and Azure, ensuring scalability and reliability.

Proficient in full-stack development using React.js, Nest.js, and TypeScript for robust frontend and backend solutions, with additional experience building backend services using Python, C#, and the .NET framework.
Specialized in performance optimization to ensure scalable, efficient, and high-quality applications across JavaScript, Python, and .NET codebases.
Skilled in database management, especially PostgreSQL, with a strong focus on data integrity, optimized queries, and effective integration with both Python- and .NET-based systems.
Experienced in building responsive, intuitive UIs using Tailwind CSS, HTML5, CSS3, and SCSS.
Proficient in deploying and managing applications on AWS and Azure, ensuring reliability, security, and scalability for multi-language environments.
Extensively used Docker for containerization, environment consistency, microservices orchestration, and streamlined deployments across multiple tech stacks.
Implemented comprehensive unit and integration tests using frameworks such as Jest, Mocha, NUnit, and PyTest to ensure code reliability, maintainability, and high test coverage.
Integrated third-party services such as Plaid, Stripe, Twilio, and other APIs to enhance application functionality and user experience across diverse tech stacks, including Python and .NET services.
Developed features across frontend and backend using modern JavaScript/TypeScript frameworks, as well as backend services built with Python and C#.
Assisted in building and integrating RESTful APIs with responsive UI components, including contributions to .NET-based API endpoints and services.
Worked with databases to design schemas, write queries, and optimize data operations across SQL, NoSQL, and .NET data layers.
Improved code quality through comprehensive unit and integration testing, code reviews, and documentation across JavaScript, Python, and .NET codebases.
Supported DevOps workflows using Git, CI/CD pipelines, and cloud deployment tools for multi-language environments.
Collaborated with senior engineers in agile sprints, contributing to efficient software delivery and cross-stack development involving JavaScript, Python, and .NET.
